name: Karik
description:
Story:  The mouse Karik lives his everyday life, being trapped between the challenging world of foods and the intoxicating world of vegetables, with nothing but a GUN!

Mechanics: A top-down twin-stick shooter game, with inspiration from the dungeon crawler genre, The paths in-game are generated procedurally and are different for every playthrough.

Move with WASD, aim with your mouse, and shoot with LMB.

Art: 24x24 pixel tiles by Khoa.

External Assets: Pixel-Font Thaleah, SFX by jsfxr, FREE Chiptune Music Loops by Tallbeard Studios

Created as a submission for the Jame Gam #20. Made in 5 days by NhoxKien and Khoa.

Thank you for playing our games! Please leave feedback!
